医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
使用单细胞质谱研究抗菌治疗失败俄克拉荷马大学道奇家庭艺术与科学学院化学和生物化学联合首席研究员和副教授劳拉-伊索贝尔·麦考尔博士和杨志博博士荣获著名的美国国立卫生研究院授予其项目“用于评估细胞内药物浓度和代谢在抗菌治疗失败中的作用的新型单细胞质谱法”的 R01 资助。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/Using-single-cell-mass-spectrometry-to-study-antimicrobial-treatment-failure.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/Using-single-cell-mass-spectrometry-to-study-antimicrobial-treatment-failure.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=265ed2be-154b-45e6-ae25-df15367f344a Wed, 19 Jul 2023 21:30:24 -0400 Using single-cell mass spectrometry to study antimicrobial treatment failure
听力干预有望保护认知能力下降风险增加的老年人虽然整个研究人群的结果为阴性，但在由 238 名参与正在进行的观察性研究的预先指定的研究人群中，听力干预将轻度至中度听力损失的老年人的认知能力下降速度减缓了 48%心脏健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/Hearing-intervention-shows-promise-in-protecting-older-adults-at-increased-risk-for-cognitive-decline.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/Hearing-intervention-shows-promise-in-protecting-older-adults-at-increased-risk-for-cognitive-decline.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ebf10735-d00a-4864-b915-08cade224714 Wed, 19 Jul 2023 21:23:45 -0400 Hearing intervention shows promise in protecting older adults at increased risk for cognitive decline
美国黑人更有可能相信黑人提供者提供的有关前列腺癌的医疗信息一项新的研究显示，美国黑人相信黑人医生或患者提供的医疗信息的可能性是白人演讲者提供的信息的 1.6 倍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/Black-Americans-more-likely-to-trust-medical-information-about-prostate-cancer-from-Black-providers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/Black-Americans-more-likely-to-trust-medical-information-about-prostate-cancer-from-Black-providers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e7f08698-c08e-4187-a0fb-3da63421d348 Wed, 19 Jul 2023 15:25:39 -0400 Black Americans more likely to trust medical information about prostate cancer from Black providers
科学家发现单细胞致病寄生虫 RNA 编辑的新细节作为波士顿大学的分子生物学家和夫妻，鲁斯兰·阿法西热夫 (Ruslan Afasizhev) 和因娜·阿法西热娃 (Inna Afasizheva) 已经合作了数十年。他们共同发表了数十篇关于单细胞致病寄生虫布氏锥虫中线粒体 DNA 和 RNA 机制的论文。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/Scientists-discover-new-details-about-RNA-editing-in-single-celled-disease-causing-parasite.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/Scientists-discover-new-details-about-RNA-editing-in-single-celled-disease-causing-parasite.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7cdb1406-eb58-46a9-9a27-11f20aee4129 Wed, 19 Jul 2023 15:19:31 -0400 Scientists discover new details about RNA editing in single-celled, disease-causing parasite
西北医学科学家发现帕金森病的新治疗靶点西北医学科学家发现了一种新机制，通过这种机制，parkin 基因的突变会导致帕金森病的家族性形式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/Northwestern-Medicine-scientists-discover-new-therapeutic-target-for-Parkinsone28099s-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/Northwestern-Medicine-scientists-discover-new-therapeutic-target-for-Parkinsone28099s-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f20a172d-b1db-4bb3-bb2b-62f724c20f77 Wed, 19 Jul 2023 14:58:48 -0400 Northwestern Medicine scientists discover new therapeutic target for Parkinson’s disease
饱腹感基因的表观遗传格式化可能会增加女性肥胖的风险是什么决定了我们是否超重？除了生活方式之外，倾向也发挥了一定作用，但基因不能完全解释体重积累过多的遗传倾向。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/Epigenic-formatting-of-satiety-gene-may-increase-risk-of-obesity-in-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/Epigenic-formatting-of-satiety-gene-may-increase-risk-of-obesity-in-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=582a8375-c9f9-42a2-996a-8dd895786ecf Wed, 19 Jul 2023 14:53:10 -0400 Epigenetic formatting of satiety gene may increase risk of obesity in women
针对“别吃我”信号可能会改善胶质母细胞瘤的免疫治疗“别吃我！”这就是如何将胶质母细胞瘤中的癌细胞发送到大脑中的巨噬细胞（专门清除死亡和垂死细胞物质的白细胞）的信号的方式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/Targeting-the-dont-eat-me-signal-may-improve-immunotherapy-for-glioblastoma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/Targeting-the-dont-eat-me-signal-may-improve-immunotherapy-for-glioblastoma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8bf1b0e7-a7b2-40dc-a11a-bd301b252b72 Wed, 19 Jul 2023 14:47:52 -0400 Targeting the "don't eat me" signal may improve immunotherapy for glioblastoma
研究表明非甾体抗炎药如何加剧艰难梭菌感染为什么非甾体抗炎药 (NSAID) 会加剧艰难梭菌胃肠道感染，而艰难梭菌是全世界抗生素相关性腹泻的主要原因？ https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/Study-shows-how-NSAIDs-exacerbate-C-difficile-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/Study-shows-how-NSAIDs-exacerbate-C-difficile-infections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=af4842af-a829-4fab-9dba-81e65a60a313 Wed, 19 Jul 2023 14:40:42 -0400 Study shows how NSAIDs exacerbate C. difficile infections
先进的扫描可以在症状出现之前发现肥厚型心肌病这项研究由英国心脏基金会资助，发表在《循环》杂志上，为尽早治疗这种疾病开辟了前景。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/Advanced-scans-can-detect-hypertropic-cardiomyopathy-before-symptoms-appear.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/Advanced-scans-can-detect-hypertropic-cardiomyopathy-before-symptoms-appear.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=536729f5-b542-43f1-8836-2854432169c7 Wed, 19 Jul 2023 14:35:23 -0400 Advanced scans can detect hypertrophic cardiomyopathy before symptoms appear
新方法可以使中风后运动康复更加有效且负担得起人体中最长的神经始于大脑，蜿蜒地沿着颈部进入胸部，在那里它分成单独的分支，缠绕其扭曲的卷须来接触每个内脏器官。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/New-method-could-make-post-中风-motor-rehabilitation-more- effective-and-affordable.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/New-method-could-make-post-中风-motor-rehabilitation-more- effective-and-affordable.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=be37b38c-ca05-49c3-b66d-edb2be7afe52 Wed, 19 Jul 2023 14:28:07 -0400 New method could make post-stroke motor rehabilitation more effective and affordable
